DOC.brief_title: Study Of Investigational Regimen Combining FDA Approved HIV Drugs In HIV Subjects Experiencing Early Virologic Failure
DOC.criteria: Currently initial HAART ( highly active antiretroviral therapy ) regimen 3TC/ZDV 3TC/d4T PI ( protease inhibitor ) boost unboosted NNRTI ( nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ) . Plasma HIV 1 RNA < 400 copies/ml least 2 documented occasion prior viral rebound . Have plasma HIV 1 RNA value > 400 copies/ml < 10,000 copies/ml 2 document successive occasion ( include screen ) separate least 2 week . A CD4+ lymphocyte count less equal 100 . Have take Abacavir ( ZIAGEN TRIZIVIR ) tenofovir ( VIREAD ) previously . Have AIDS define illness within 30 day screen . Pregnant breastfeeding . Specified viral genotype upon screen . And inclusion exclusion criterion evaluate physician .
